subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Brad Boyes scored a tiebreaking power-play goal in Florida’s four-goal third period, and the host Panthers rallied past the Toronto Maple Leafs, 6-4, on Sunday.
snippet: Brad Boyes scored a tiebreaking power-play goal in Florida’s four-goal third period, and the host Panthers rallied past the Toronto Maple Leafs, 6-4, on Sunday.
